dc:title: Cimice.net - Raw dataset
dc:description: Data collected from the CASE application in the period from march 2019 to october 2021 in the Emilia Romagna Region.
dc:creator: BIG

tables.dc:description: The question that can be asked on a task.

tables.dc:title: Task on geo object
tables.dc:description: The task executed on a geo_object.

tables.dc:title: Given answer
tables.dc:description: The answer given to a question for a given task on a geo_object.
